title: Google pixel 3a, android 11: suddenly getting each text I send to the group chat sent back to me
content:
Edit: so when I went to "advanced settings", my number was listed as "unknown".  So I inputted my number but it's still sending the texts back at me.

Hi, whenever I send a text to my group chat, the text I send is sent back to me as if sent by someone else.  I wasn't having this problem up until this morning.  How do I stop it from doing this?

In "group details", my number is listed as "me".
